captions.text: A Jubilee Project short film (for a good cause)
Can I borrow your pen real quick?
I'd love to see you again. Can I have your number?
Haha if you want I'll be here again tomorrow.
Sounds good. I'll see you then :)
It's good to see you again!
Would you like to listen to my song?
That's weird I don't hear any...
The Jubilee Project produced this film to raise support and awareness for the American Society for Deaf Children.
Written & Directed By: Jason Y. Lee
Produced by: Eddie and Jason Lee
Special Thanks: Alice Zhou and Eric Lu

title: Love Language | Original Jubilee Project Short Film

comments.author: Ashley Moy (Princess of King Jesus)

comments.text:
At EDSOR Peace Camp today.  It is an event where students leaders from 
Poveda, ICA, LSGH, & Xavier commune for a different learning experience. 
 This year's theme, Social Media for Social Transformation.

One of the plenary speaker shared this video to the participants, 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QyB_U9vn6Wk

and she asked for a reaction from the participants, a student from LSGH 
said, "You don't love someone because they are perfect, but you love them 
despite their imperfection." 

I am so touched!  Happy to watch to video & be able to listen to the 
speaker.﻿
comments.author: Gary Garcia

comments.text: Love this. Brought a tear to my eyes!﻿
comments.author: Stakie

comments.text:
Hi guys! Not trying to spam but we are a amateur film production group with 
JubileeProject being one of our major inspirations, especially in creating 
stories with impactful messages. We are obviously not anywhere close in 
terms of ability, but we've only been doing this for a year and absolutely 
love it. It would mean a lot to us if you guys could check out our videos 
and maybe subscribe/share them with your friends if you like them at all! ﻿
